title: Boy of Southeast Asia
brief_description: Presents Geng, the young son in a typical home and his brother going to school. Shows the countryside of Southeast Asia, its ancient temples, girls fishing in rivers and river boats carrying cargo and passengers. Suitable for primary school level.
